plot: A Southern minister is assigned to a poor church in California where the congregation is drifting away and the church itself is scheduled for demolition.
title: A Dream for Christmas
plot_es: A Southern minister is assigned to a poor church in California where the congregation is drifting away and the church itself is scheduled for demolition.
plot_en: A Southern minister is assigned to a poor church in California where the congregation is drifting away and the church itself is scheduled for demolition.
